CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The UV - visible absorption spectra of the synthesized polymers were recorded in both chloroform solution and as a solid thin film.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| synthesized polymers |
| chloroform solution |
| solid thin film |

In this paragraph, the "Material Name" entities refer to the substances or materials that are either being acted upon or are part of the process being described. The synthesized polymers are the primary material being analyzed, while chloroform solution and solid thin film represent the states or forms in which the polymers are studied.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| synthesized polymers |

After reevaluating the paragraph, I realized that the other entities do not clearly refer to "Material Name." Chloroform solution and solid thin film are more accurately described as "Sample Preparation" or "State of Material," but not as a material itself. Therefore, the only valid "Material Name" entity in this paragraph is:

* synthesized polymers
